intro: Sofía Vergara is a renowned Colombian-American actress and television personality, best known for her role in "Modern Family".

text:
It's never too late to learn about this fabulous star!

Sofía Vergara was born on January 10, 1973, in Barranquilla, Colombia, to a loving family of seven children. Growing up in a vibrant city surrounded by the Caribbean Sea, Sofía developed a passion for the performing arts from a young age. She began taking dance lessons at the age of 5 and quickly fell in love with the stage.

After completing her high school education, Sofía pursued a degree in dentistry at the University of Colombia. However, her true calling remained in the entertainment industry. She decided to take a chance and move to Bogotá, Colombia, to pursue a career in modeling and acting.

Sofía's big break came when she won the Miss Barranquilla pageant in 1995, which led to her representing Colombia at the 1995 Miss Universe pageant. Although she didn't win the crown, her participation in the competition sparked her international recognition.

In the early 2000s, Sofía transitioned to acting, landing roles in Colombian telenovelas and films. Her breakout role came when she starred in the critically acclaimed series "Acording to Salvadora" in 2007. The show's massive success earned her a Latin Grammy nomination for Best Actress.

In 2009, Sofía made her Hollywood debut in the film "Machete", followed by notable roles in "Chef" and "Hot Pursuit". However, it was her role as Gloria Delgado-Pritchett in the ABC sitcom "Modern Family" that brought her international fame and numerous award nominations. Her portrayal of the vibrant and lovable Colombian matriarch earned her multiple Emmy and Golden Globe nominations.

Sofía has become a household name, not only for her acting talent but also for her stunning looks, infectious laugh, and charming personality. She has been named one of the most beautiful and highest-paid women in the world by various media outlets. When she's not busy filming or promoting her projects, Sofía loves spending time with her husband, Joe Gonzalez, and their son, Manolo.
